artist: Artist: Luciano Lattanzi; Printer: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
description: recto: abstract design; looping borders on sides; top border has alternating bars; bottom border has bars with wavy edges; rows of round, floral-like forms--larger forms with dark centers and smaller daisy-like forms--and horizontal rectangles, ovals and wavy forms; some circles inside squares with X's on top; verso: abstract image printed in green; rectangle split into three triangles with diagonal lines; green spots and painterly, smeary areas
markings: LLC, in pencil: Proof (I state) 1/1 | LLC, impressed in paper: [triangle symbol]
provenance: Dolly J. Fiterman, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2016
signed: bottom left of center, in pencil: (MINNEAPOLIS) | LRC, in pencil: Lattanzi 78
title: City of Lakes
